name: Prophet Equity
overview: Prophet Equity is a private equity firm that uses proven, data-driven analytical techniques coupled with over 100 years of investment and management experience to invest in, unlock and realize future value today. Partnering with owners and management teams, their team of experts utilize a toolkit that is Fortune 500 tested and private equity proven to diagnose and drive dramatic value creation. Portfolio company management teams are highly motivated with clear, uncapped incentives based on realized business performance.

milestones.description: Silicon Storage Technology to be Acquired for $2.10 per Share
milestones.source_description: Silicon Storage Technology to be Acquired for $2.10 per Share
